<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Otherworldly Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=17) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Elf" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=58" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 40 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your elven magic manifests as a simple arcane spell, even if you aren’t formally trained in magic. Choose one cantrip from the [arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1) spell list. You can cast this cantrip as an arcane innate spell at will. A cantrip is heightened to a spell level equal to half your level rounded up.
name: Otherworldly Magic
